name: Caduceus Staff
description: Range +1 to damaging spells. @{attribute}{Sacred} equipment associated with the @{ability}{Major Crest of Cethleann||Minor Crest of Cethleann}{Crest of Cethleann}.

modifiers.maxrng: bothif not(unit|tagged|healing) and unit|total|mttype == mttype|mag then 1 else 0 end

comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
